((Its Late Excuse my grammer))

::Koj::
Koj Putting the finishing touch on his black smithing project as as one more 
coat of diamond dust as the tekno rangs fuse releasing the stolen power and 
power stealing as the matrix enegry and dark plasma effect the properties of 
the rangs mutating them into a deeper hunger. Koj finished looking at the 
golden razor edged long sword.

::Inu::
"Why did you make the blade golden?" As he gets ready to present the gift.

::Koj::
"You know the story of the Unicorn Samurai she killed the Demon King the 
legend say that her golden Katana was the only thing that hurt the Demon in 
the battle. Liono may be able to silence his Demon with this."
Koj but the sword in the case. As he carries it towards the Helm of the 
ship.

::Lilly::
"That blade it has same hunger as the Fang but its seems strange it has a 
deeper hunger than the Fang but for what?" Leaning agaisnt the wall as she 
analyzes the sword.

::Key::
"What else can the Fang eat?" Key siting down review the X-ray scan data.

::Lilly::
"I don't know all I know is Koj got his from the death of his father its his 
fathers right fang. You know Koj killed his father to avenge his mother."

::Rinoa::
"What do you mean Avenge his mother you mean Koj's father killed his 
mother."

::Koj::
"I'm half breed one of the few 1/2 Autobot and 1/2" Koj stops in mid 
sentence.

::Dark::
"Your one of the few that survived most half breeds go mad not knowing which 
side you belong to or are extreme weak you seem to be neither." Laughs 
thinks the death of your mother may saved your very spark.

::Koj::
Koj looks at dark "I may be a half breed but it beats being born out of a 
test tube as lab rat." As he enters the helm. "Liono we made you this to 
replace the one you lost its called the Spark Reaver." As he sets down the 
case.

::Dark::
"HMMMMMMMMM Momma's Boy has a weak spot." Dark snickers theres more to Koj 
than what he telling us and Liono it or he wouldn't trust Koj.

::Liono::
"HMMMMMMMMMMMM" Liono opens the case looks at the sword as he grasp the hilt 
it shocks him and bond with him. "This is a great honor" as he feels the 
blade pluse in his hand. He can feel it surge with each of the cats power.
